features: CARE YOUR HEALTH FROM YOUR WRIST: You can measure your blood oxygen saturation and understand your physical state Ideal for high-intensity sports such as marathon and gym workouts. V7 smartwatche also professionally analyzes sleep quality to help you adjust your sleep habits. It even monitors your 20-minute daily nap

MULTI -FUNCTION SMART WATCH: Equipped with 1.7"HD Extra-large full touch screen. SKG smartwatch can accurately track your health metrics (heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep and stress level). Impressive 8-day battery life between a 2h flash charge.

14 ACTIVITY TRACKING: This fitness sport watch has 14+ sports modes check all-day activities data like steps, distance. Water-resistant up to 50 meters, you can wear the V7 smart watch for swimming and it will record your achievements even under water.
APP SUPPORT FOR ANDROID SAMSUNG IPHONE:The SKG V7 smart watch is compatible with iOS 9.0+ & Android 6 +, Bluetooth 5.2 below smartphones. Download and install "VeryFit" APP.

SKG ALWAYS STAY WITH U: You never want to spend money to buy an unhappy shopping experience. So do we. SKG is committed to providing excellent products and 12 months waranty services .If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us with any problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FUNCTIONAL SMARTWATCH FOR YOUR DAILY DEMAND This smartwatch is made with the 1.69 full color large screen and skin-friendly silicone band, has the basic watch functions as the clock, alarm, stopwatch, weather display, message notification, etc. Lightweight and confortable to wear, uses with VeryFit App and supports IOS 9.0+ and Android 6.0+.

SKG V7 SMART WATCH FOR MEN & WOMEN SKG V7 smart watch is designed with various functions to make your life easier, such as Daily Monitoring (Heart rate/Sleep/Blood Oxygen/Step/Calorie/Distance/Stress/Women Health ); Remind Functions(Message/Sedantary/Exercise/Health/APP Reminder, etc), 14+ Exercise Modes to choose indoors & outdoors.

Heart Rate Monitoring To show the range of your heart beat, the average level and your resting heart rate level, whether it is in good condition or not, the watch will remind you if the data is far beyond the normal range. Blood Oxygen Monitoring To deliver the recent SpO2 varying range and let you know the blood oxygen saturation when you do exeercises or click the function on the smart watch. Sleep Monitoring To get you know the sleep duration at night, your heat rate, stressm respiratory quality while sleeping and give your a score about the sleep quality by analyze your different sleep stages. Stress Monitoring To see whether your stress is beyond the average level and give you a overview of the data recorded day/week/month/year Women Health Monitoring Using the SKG V7 Smart Watch app(VeryFit) to track your menstrual cycle and symptoms, view the ovulation forecast calendar, and more.

DURABLE, LONG LASTING, WATERPROFF Magnetic Suction Charging 2 Hours Charging Time，8 Continuous Days ，30 Days Stanby，SKG V7 Smart Watch is equipped with a large-capacity battery, sole that you can use it for a long time, without any pressure. 5ATM Water Resistance SKG V7 Smart Watch has 5ATM waterproof function, water-resistant depth of 50 meters, very powerful, so that you are indoors, or indoors are useful.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES OF THE FITNESS WATCH Weather DISPLAY Click and push "Weather Forecast" in the app, You will know the weather condition timely, change your clothes accordingly and easily plan your travel. Smart Notification SKG V7 Smart Watch can inform you of any important information timely such as:Calls, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp messages, text, email. Music Control Switch music on your wrist, music will continue on the phone or the earbud, once connected, you can freely swicth and enjoy the music in your playlist SEDANTARY REMINDER SKG V7 will give you smart reminder to drink some water and move around when you are doing long-term desk working or studing, helpful to keep fit.

VERYFIT APP DOWNLOAD & CONNECTION App Download：Download and install the "VeryFit" app from App Store or Google Play or by scanning the QR code. Pairing: Turn on VeryFit app -> Enable Bluetooth in your phone -> Search the device in app to pair (or scan the QR code on the watch) -> Finish binding, if any problem, please let us know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Healthy Smart watch
reviews.reviewText: Very great watch. I was kind of confused when I received this watch because I didn’t know if it had text messages but when you scroll down on the screen, your messages does appear great watch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a replacement for my Vivofit4, which died. Didn't want to spend the huge $ that some require, so I found this on Amazon and have been using it for a couple weeks. Still learning how/what to use; but so far - Pluses: 1) Big time numbers - very easy to read. 2) Customizable watch face to show what I want to see at a glance. 3) Great battery life - after a week of wear, it's still 70% charged. I charge it Sunday nights for the week. 4)Activity tracking with 14 activities - I use the Outdoor Walk, Workout and Elliptical. Excellent tracking. 5) Step tracking is right on. 6) Heart rate - watched it through a workout and it appears correct. 7) Veryfit app works well. 8) Documentation is pretty good although I continue to refer to the manual to understand how things work/are working. 8) GPS through the app works well. Minuses: 1) Doesn't seem able to track stress. Could be that my wrist is too hairy. Get the "wear watch tightly" too frequently. Funny though. Seems to do heart rate just fine. 2) Temperature doesn't refresh as frequently as I expected, and can be up to 8 hours late. Does refresh every time I look at the app; but then I'm on my phone anyway, so I may as well look there. 3) Don't seem to have all the functions listed in the manual.Note: I don't use the sleep function. Prefer not to wear it overnight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After about a week of use it is still working well.
reviews.reviewText: My charge 5 crapped out after about 10 months. I thought I would find a cheaper replacement after spending all that money on the charge 5 I thought I would get something cheaper. This watch does everything the charge 5 does and more. It is easy to read after wearing it a week the battery is still at 63%. I like that it has a button you push to read the time and other data instead of coming on when you raise your wrist, but if you prefer the raise your wrist function you can set it to do that. The phone app is okay but I have a hard time getting it to connect to the watch some times. I can't speak to longevity yet, but I will when it fails. So far I like it better than the charge 5. The main functions I use it for are to track sleep, calories, and blood oxygen .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT count steps!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a watch that I could use at my local pool where I walk that would count my steps and tell me if I had a text or phone call while I was in the pool, since I can't take my phone in the water.It is not very user friendly and the instructions come printed in a very light mint green which is pretty, but hard to read. Once you download the app and get it started then you can access a file that has some instructions, this time in black. Some instructions. Again, not user friendly, it doesn't fully explain itself. The app wants you to subscribe to a monthly plan, but I declined and just used the free version. The watch is large and not the most comfortable to wear. You have to keep it one finger width away from your hand but it felt very large. If it had worked I probably would have gotten used to it.You can change the watch face, and in the app you can tell it where you live and the watch will tell you the time and weather. It handled the pool really well and told me if I had a text or phone call.What it doesn't do is tell you how many steps you take. It'll remind you to walk more, so you get up and walk around, and it doesn't recognize the movement. I thought that maybe it was just user error so I asked my techie husband to see what I was doing wrong. He tried for 2 hours to get it to work, even wearing it and moving at different speeds around the house. Nope. It wouldn't work for him either.So I am sending this back to Amazon, and I'm grateful that they have such good customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sent this one back...
reviews.reviewText: Price for this item is very good - but style is sort of an issue. Watch slips around my wrist from side to side and eventually the band holding the extra strap slips up to the buckle and then you have a strap sticking out. I realize that the price drives function to a point but I really don't like the time (watch) displays you have to choose from - still trying all of them out but I have seen better displays. As with most things like this getting used to using the functions takes a little time. Had a few moments trying to start the "outside" walk function and then turning it off. Finally figured it out and I can make most functions perform now. As far as I can tell there is no automatic link to the phone app - you have to open the app before it will update the data on the phone. Also not sure why each function in the app wants access to my contacts, pictures and locations. I know why they want them but why do they "need" them. I have located another watch with a style I think I might like better at a similar price, they are on the way and I will decide soon if I return these and keep the others. More to follow....Spent about a week figuring out how to make the watch work, finally was able to get all the functions to work on the phone. But, the unit lost communication with the app on my phone. Spend a couple of days trying to get it to work again but the phone could not locate the watch and I could not get it to sync manually - strange that is was still sending my email to the watch. I finally decided to delete the app, and reinstall the app and attempt to bind the two, nothing... Finally tried to "reset" the watch which left me with only two screens - one telling me to download the app the other showing a QR Code. Unable to get anything to work after that. Sent two watches back (one unopened) and ordered watches from another company. As mentioned above - the band clasp kept slipping up my wrist until I had a "tail" sticking out sideways. Did not have a good experience overall...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Watch to have
reviews.reviewText: I like this watch for a lot of reason. The price is nice. I like that you can change the face of the watch on your app. Another plus is the app is free dose not cost anything to use. I waited about year to do the review to see how it worked. It is still working. Do not recommend getting it wet, mind you never have so that's why I am saying that. So I high recommend this watch if you are on a budget. A lot of people think my watch is an Apple watch which says a lot on how it looks. So for all the reason above this watch is a good buy.

I wanted something simple to use and that had the indicators most relevant to me and I got what I wanted for the right price.My only drawback is that it doesn't connect to the Weight Watcher app the way my Fitbit used to. In order for it to connect, I had to link it to Google Fit which in turn connects to Weight Watcher's app. If that isn't a requirement for you then you are good to go. So far so good. Fingers crossed it has a long life.
Producto de buena calidad, llego a tiempo, fue un regalo para mi nieto, le gustó mucho

reviews.reviewerName: ツリキチ福ちゃんツリキチ福ちゃん
reviews.reviewText: 息子の誕生日祝いに夫婦にプレゼント、気に入ってくれたようです。

When I first got the watch a full charge last a week and a bit. Now last 4 days maybe if that. Disconnects from the app every time I charge it. Basically it's a glorified step counter that tells time.
いまいち使い方が分からない。
